alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Mason; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 12:32PM EDT until June 17 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM EDT FOR WESTERN MASON...ROBERTSON AND BRACKEN COUNTIES... At 1232 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brooksville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Washington, Ripley, Brooksville, Mount Olivet, Germantown, Sardis, Murphysville, Stonewall, Mays Lick, Powersville, Peed, Johnsville, Chatham, Tuckahoe, Hittville, Minerva, US Route 62 at State Route 875, Abigail and Woolcutt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
